# CONTRIBUTING

MealCraft also server as a learning resource for aspiring developers who want to dive in to backend/frontend development.

If you want to contribute to the project, you will find resources in our [wiki](https://github.com/Wickedviruz/MealCraft/wiki).

We also recommend you to read our [Contributor code of conduct](https://github.com/Wickedviruz/MealCraft/wiki/Code-of-Conduct).

## Quick Links

- [Development Workflow](https://github.com/Wickedviruz/MealCraft/wiki/Development-Workflow)
- [Project Structure](https://github.com/Wickedviruz/MealCraft/wiki/Project-Structure)
- [Installation Guide](https://github.com/Wickedviruz/MealCraft/wiki/Installation-Guide)

## AUTHORS & CONTRIBUTORS

This project exists thanks to the [authors]().

All contributors, big or small, are appriciated!

Thanks!
